Description: Kanban Software for Lean Management See your department and company workflows at a glance. Visualize dependencies. Make your work flow.
Name: Kanbanize

Methods.Name: Log Time
Methods.Description: This method allows you to log time to a Task.

Methods.Name: Get Projects
Methods.Description: This method allows you to get the details of all Projects.

Methods.Name: List Tasks
Methods.Description: This method will return all tasks.

Methods.Name: Get Task
Methods.Description: This method will return details of the requested Task.

Methods.Name: Update Task
Methods.Description: This method will allow you to update the details of a task.

Methods.Name: Add Task
Methods.Description: This method will allow you to create a new task.

Methods.Name: Delete Task
Methods.Description: This method will delete a Task.

Methods.Name: Move Task
Methods.Description: This method will move a task.

Methods.Name: Archive Task
Methods.Description: This method will archive a task.

Methods.Name: Block Task
Methods.Description: This method will block a task.

Methods.Name: Unblock Task
Methods.Description: This method will unblock a task.

Methods.Name: Add Task Comment
Methods.Description: This method will add a comment to a task.

Methods.Name: Add Subtask
Methods.Description: This method will add a subtask.

Methods.Name: Update Subtask
Methods.Description: This method will update a subtask.

Methods.Name: Get Board Settings
Methods.Description: This method will get settings of a Board.

Methods.Name: Get Board Structure Full
Methods.Description: This method will get full structure pf a Board.

Methods.Name: Get Board Activities
Methods.Description: This method will get activities associated with a Board.

Methods.Name: Get Board Links
Methods.Description: This method will return links for a board.

Methods.Name: Edit Link
Methods.Description: This method will edit a link.

Methods.Name: Get Task Links
Methods.Description: This method will return links for a task.

Methods.Name: Edit Custom Field
Methods.Description: This allows you to edit a Custom Field.  The Custom Field must already exist.
